title: Blazor webassembly storing auth0 secrets
body:
For Blazor Server I store Auth0 settings for an API I consume using AWS Parameter Store.

I want to store secrets for a Blazor web assembly app and everywhere tells me that you shouldn't store any user secrets because it is downloaded by the client.

Thats all fine - I get why - but I need to interact with my API which requires Auth0 keys etc. - so where do I store/use these keys for my web assembly app?
